Question
========

Which of the following is an example of a classification problem?

Answerlist
----------

* Predicting tomorrow’s stock price based on today’s price.
* Predicting the rental price of an apartment.
* Identifying whether a tumor is present in an MRI scan.
* Estimating how much a customer will spend on their next purchase.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Regression
* Regression
* Classification
* Regression
